docs.text: AWS Solutions Architect Professional Exam Study Guide Study Materials Used Adrian Cantrill's Course About This study guide is my personal notes for preparing for the SAPRO exam. Exam Areas Domain % of Exam Domain 1: Design for Organizational Complexity 12.5% Domain 2: Design for New Solutions 31% Domain 3: Migration Planning 15% Domain 4: Cost Control 12.5% Domain 5: Continuous Improvement for Existing Solutions 29% My Question Analysis Technique Understand - Determine the key question - the "kicker" - Figure out what everything means - question and response Eliminate - Get rid of responses that are fake or have errors - Get rid of responses that conflict with the question Evaluate - Think through tradeoffs for remaining responses - Consider both stated and implied dimensions Choose - Pick the right answer - Select best options or eliminate the bad ones Validate - Make sure the response answers the key question - Make sure the response doesn't conflict with any details
